titleStmt.title: A friendly and seasonable advertisement concerning the dog-days, by Nath. Merry Philo-chim. In regard there are many that perish in and about this city &c. through an evil custom, arising from a false opinion, that is not safe to take physick in the extreams of heat and cold, or in the dog days ...
